name: Outlander Factory
description:
End of first year group project at creajeux.

Game page on creajeux website

A management game programmed in sfml c.

Targeting from moderate to hardcore achiever players, with long gameplay loops and a high level of depth.

In a frost post-apocalyptic world, where surviving has become a challenge, you decide, inspired by the great capitalism to sell those so wanted resources to the survivors, building a production line and selling booth at the same time, but you’re not the only one with this idea.

Main goal : manage your money to keep afloat your business by selling items.

GAMEPLAY LOOP:

During the night :

    Build machines and robots,

    Buy items and transform them,

During the day :

    Manage the store while the clients are coming,

    Sell as many items as you can,

Back to night :

    Upgrade and improve the whole chain,

Repeat.

Side goals : 

  •     expand your business to make even more profit
  •     optimize the production and the public part of the store
  •     fortify the store against bandits raids
  •     use the market prices to focus on particular item

Team:

6 Devs and 5 graphs
